shortened_description: Request to review service fees associated with wire transfers WT20230915-448 and WT20230918-912 due to internal reclassifications at Johnson Corp.
reason: Sarah Jenkins from Johnson Corp is requesting clarification on wire transfer fees for internal reclassifications, believing a lower fee structure or waiver may be applicable.  Supporting documents include an internal reclassification report. Brenda Miller forwarded to Victor Ochoa.
